content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Enumerate company employees.

Variation: Manual Review


1. Execute the following Google dork. Replace artisanpartners.com with your target domain.
site:leadferret.com artisanpartners.com

2. Once you know the company URL you can also perform Google dorking like the following:
site:leadferret.com directory/company/ company.com
site:leadferret.com directory/company/ target.com

Note: Large companies seem to have multiple URLs. However, there may be some way to crawl them all.
